title: Credit for payments
context: ยง576B-209 Credit for payments. A tribunal of this State shall credit amounts collected for a particular period pursuant to any child support order against the amounts owed for the same period under any other child support order for support of the same child issued by a tribunal of this State, another state, or a foreign country. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1]
